miner_table_header_keyword_tips.message: Keyword according to its relation to the search terms.

miner_table_header_product_top10_tips.message: Take a quick summary view of the top 10 products based on the search organic results.

miner_table_header_month_trends_tips.message: Search trends for this keyword over the past 2 to 3 years (monthly).

miner_table_header_relevancy_tips.message: A high score indicating how closely related the keyword is to the seed keyword.

miner_table_header_aba_rank_tips.message:
Upper number shows the monthly search frequency rank
Lower number shows the weekly search frequency rank
The data comes from Amazon's Brand Analytics in Amazon Seller Central,
the smaller the number, the higher the ranking and the higher the search volume.

miner_table_header_title_searches_tips.message: The number of searches for this keyword in a natural month, such as July 2021.

miner_table_header_SPR_tips.message:
SellerSprite Product Rank, estimated number of units that need to be sold over 8 days, resulting from a search
for this keyword in order for the product to rank on top half of page one for this keyword.

miner_table_header_title_density_tips.message: Number of page 1 products with the searched keyword in their title.

miner_table_header_aba_purchases.message:
Upper: The volume of purchase after searching for this keyword on Amazon in a month.
Lower: Purchase Rate=Monthly Sales/Monthly Search Volume

miner_table_header_product_result_tips.message:
Upper: Demand to Supply Ratio = search volume (demand) / number of items (supply)
Lower: The number of related products that appear after searching for the keyword (All Departments catogories).

miner_table_header_supply_demand_ratio_t.message: Demand to Supply Ratio = Search Volume ( Demand ) / Search Results ( Supply )

miner_table_header_ad_competitors_tips.message:
The total number of advertised products displayed in the first 3 pages
of search results for the keyword in the past 7 days.

miner_table_header_click_concentration_t.message:
Upper: Sum of top 3 ASINs click share from ABA Data
Lower: Sum of top 3 ASINs conversion share from ABA Data

miner_table_header_ppc_bid_tips.message: Average bid of “Pay-Per-Click” for this keyword. System provides suggested bid range.

reverse_table_header_keyword_tips.message: Keywords that bring this ASIN to the top 3 pages of Amazon search results in the last 30 days.

reverse_table_header_product_top10_tips.message: Take a quick summary view of the top 10 products based on the search organic results.

reverse_table_header_month_trends_tips.message: Search trends for this keyword over the past 2 to 3 years (monthly).

reverse_table_header_traffic_proportion_.message:
First line: Click Share, refers to the percentage of clicks that the product received in comparison to the total clicks based on the search results.
Second line: Estimated Weekly Impressions, refers to the estimated number of times this keyword is searched in this week.
Third line: according to the traffic and keyword ranking to determine the highly searched words, High-ranking words or long-tail words.

reverse_table_header_aba_rank_tips.message:
Search Frequency Rank，it is the rank (numeric) of a particular search
term based on its popularity for a particular time period.

reverse_table_header_searchs_tips.message: The number of searches for this keyword in a natural month, such as July 2021.

reverse_table_header_spr_tips.message:
SellerSprite Product Rank: Estimated number of units that need to be sold over 8 days, resulting from a search
for this keyword in order for the product to rank on top half of page one for this keyword.

reverse_table_header_title_density_tips.message: Number of page 1 products with the searched keyword in their title.

reverse_table_header_purchases_tips.message:
Upper: The volume of purchase after searching for this keyword on Amazon in a month.
Lower: Purchase Rate=Monthly Sales/Monthly Search Volume

reverse_table_header_results_tips.message: The total number of products returned in a customer search using this keyword/phrase.

reverse_table_header_supply_demand_ratio.message: Demand to Supply Ratio = Search Volume ( Demand ) / Search Results ( Supply )

reverse_table_header_ad_competitors_tips.message:
The total number of advertised products displayed in the first 3 pages of search results for
the keyword in the past 7 days.

reverse_table_header_click_concentration.message:
Upper: Sum of top 3 ASINs click share from ABA Data
Lower: Sum of top 3 ASINs conversion share from ABA Data

reverse_table_header_ppc_bid_tips.message: Average bid of “Pay-Per-Click” for this keyword. System provides suggested bid range.

product_table_header_month_ratings_tips.message: The number of new ratings in the last 30 days for this ASIN

product_table_header_percentage_ratings_.message: Number of new ratings in the last 30 days / Sales in the last 30 days * 100%

product_table_header_sale_trends_tips.message: Mouse over to see estimated monthly sales, click the drop-down arrow to switch to see parent/variation sales trends.

product_table_header_sale_tips.message:
The Number of Units Sold in the past 30 days
Click on the numbers to see the historical sales trend for the last 3 years

product_table_header_monthly_sales_tips.message:
The Revenue in the past 30 days
Monthly Revenue=Monthly Sales* BuyBox Price

product_table_header_gross_margin_tips.message:
Gross Margin = (Sales - Referral Fees - FBA Fees)/Sales*100%
Click on the numbers below to see detailed calculation of fees.

product_table_header_FBA_tips.message: FBA fees are calculated per unit, based on size and weight of the product.

product_table_header_seller_tips.message: The Number of Sellers currently selling this ASIN

product_table_header_fulfillment_tips.message: Fulfillment method of the current Buybox (FBA, FBM, or AMZ)

miner_table_filter_broad_match_tips.message:
Check this box to expand the keywords according to the current seed phrase.
The results contain the seed word/phrase.

miner_table_filter_AC_tips.message: Amazon Choice: Filter keyword results based on the Amazon Choice badge status

miner_table_filter_ABA_tips.message: Search Frequency Rank. It is the rank (numeric) of a particular search term based on its popularity for a month

miner_table_filter_searchs_tips.message: The number of searches for this keyword in a natural month, such as July 2021.

miner_table_filter_SPR_tips.message:
SellerSprite Product Rank: Estimated number of units that need to be sold over 8 days,
resulting from a search for this keyword in order for the product to rank on top half of page one for this keyword.

miner_table_filter_title_tips.message: Number of page 1 products with the searched keyword in their title.

miner_table_filter_buy_tips.message: The volume of purchase after searching for this keyword on Amazon in a month.

miner_table_filter_goods_tips.message: Total number of products returned in a customer search using this keyword/phrase

miner_table_filter_supply_rate_tips.message: Demand to Supply Ratio = Search Volume ( Demand ) / Search Results ( Supply )

miner_table_filter_ad_competitors_tips.message: The total number of advertised products displayed in the first 3 pages of search results for the keyword in the past 7 days.

miner_table_filter_click_tips.message: Click Concentration is calculated by taking the top three ASINs’ number of clicks combined, divided by the total amount of clicks.

miner_table_filter_sum_top3_tips.message: Sum of top 3 ASINs conversion share from ABA Data

miner_table_filter_PPC_tips.message: Average bid of “Pay-Per-Click” for this keyword. System provides recommended bid range.

miner_table_filter_exclude_tips.message: Exclude phrases that contain entered keywords (separate with commas)

miner_table_filter_include_tips.message: Enter up to 200 keywords, separated by commas.

reverse_table_filter_AC_tips.message: Amazon Choice: Filter keyword results based on the Amazon Choice badge status

reverse_table_filter_traffic_tips.message: The percentage of clicks that the product received in comparison to the total clicks based on the search results

reverse_table_filter_ABA_tips.message: Search Frequency Rank，it is the rank (numeric) of a particular search term based on its popularity for a week

reverse_table_filter_searchs_tips.message: The number of searches for this keyword in a natural month, such as July 2021

reverse_table_filter_SPR_tips.message:
SellerSprite Product Rank: Estimated number of units that need to be sold over 8 days,
resulting from a search for this keyword in order for the product to rank on top half of page one for this keyword

reverse_table_filter_title_tips.message: Number of page 1 products with the searched keyword in their title

reverse_table_filter_buy_tips.message: The volume of purchase after searching for this keyword on Amazon in a month.

reverse_table_filter_goods_tips.message: Total number of products returned in a customer search using this keyword/phrase

reverse_table_filter_ad_competitors_tips.message:
The total number of advertised products displayed in the first 3 pages

reverse_table_filter_click_tips.message:

reverse_table_filter_sum_rate_tips.message: Sum of top 3 ASINs conversion share from ABA Data

reverse_table_filter_PPC_tips.message: Average bid of “Pay-Per-Click” for this keyword. System provides recommended bid range

reverse_table_filter_exclude_tips.message: Exclude phrases that contain entered keywords (separate with commas)

reverse_table_filter_include_tips.message: Enter up to 200 keywords, separated by commas

product_table_header_monthly_child_sales.message: The sales data for this variation in the past 30 days is sourced directly from the Amazon search page.
